properties.title: ConvLSTM rainfall nowcasting model - Native PyTorch
properties.description: Manually implemented ConvLSTM model in PyTorch for rainfall nowcasting. Used to evaluate interoperability and model reproducibility. Based on architecture of Demetrakopoulos (2023).
properties.training_data: Radar precipitation dataset from Demetrakopoulos 2023, via KNMI API (https://github.com/petrosDemetrakopoulos/LSTM-radar-precipitation-forecast)
